official_title: A bill to permit certain funds granted to the city of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, by the Economic Development Administration to continue to be used for economic development purposes in that city.

summary.text: Prohibits the deobligation of the grant made available to the city of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, for the economic development of the American Street industrial corridor.

titles.title: A bill to permit certain funds granted to the city of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, by the Economic Development Administration to continue to be used for economic development purposes in that city.
